name: Bounce! Bounce!
description:
> Controls

Keyboard & Mouse
Move WASD
Jump Space Bar
Run Hold Shift
Look Mouse
Shoot Balls Left Mouse Click

> About

Bounce your yellow balls into as many targets as quickly as possible!

Explore a rich, dynamic, low-poly world in 3 dimensions filled with interesting characters and detailed story-lines. Save the Prince from his evil step-father! Take down drug lords and their Big-Pharma Corporation! Or maybe there's non of that and actually a game about bouncing your yellow balls into as many targets as quickly as possible!

Download it, play it, record all of your deepest darkest secrets in the comments section below! 

> Lore

Bounce Bounce!

> Planned Updates
  1. Nope!
  2. Maybe a bonus level, upgrades, and sniper rifle.
